front.title: IPv6 Test Address Space Reserved for Documentation, Examples and Private Testing

abstract.t: To reduce the likelihood of conflict and confusion, an IPv6 prefixis reserved for use in private testing or as examples in other RFCs,documentation, and the like. Since site local addresses have specialmeaning in IPv6, these cannot be used in many example situations andare confusing. Instead, an IPv6 prefix is reserved in the range ofthe test address space.
